fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Energy, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: European legislation in the energy sector, including the Energy Union, energy efficiency, renewables, internal energy market, nuclear safety and liability, energy infrastructure, European environmental legislation, energy regulation and competition issues.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: At national level, Slovenské elektrárne is the biggest electricity producer in Slovakia with 69% of the country’s generation market. Slovenské elektrárne is the main supplier of electricity and ancillary services in Slovakia. It operates two nuclear, two thermal and 31 hydro power plants generating  almost 90% of electricity without greehouse gas emissions.
relevant_communication: Participation in or organization of working groups, conferences, round tables and public debates.
position: Head of European and strategic regulation
